definitions: with reference to the principles of right and wrong behavior

examples.text: he believed the war was morally justified

shortDefinitions: with reference to principles of right and wrong behaviour

definitions: in a way that is considered right according to the code of behavior of a particular society

examples.text: he insisted that his children act morally
people expected the government to behave morally

shortDefinitions: in way that is considered right according to code of behaviour of particular society
